message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, of course!

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the product's value to you, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Hi Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. While $15,000 represents a fair price, I'm willing to meet you closer to your range. How about $13,000?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
